metadata.description: Agent Context Protocol (ACP) skills for any kind of tasks, managed by Claude herself, added as she works

plugins.name: github-issues
plugins.description: GitHub issue and milestone management utilities. Scripts: move_subissues.py (move sub-issues between parents), milestone_from_issues.py (convert issues to milestones with routing), set_milestone_recursive.py (set milestone on sub-issues recursively), set_milestone_recursive_all.py (process all milestones in a repo), division_issues_to_milestones.py (convert Division-labeled issues to milestones)
